summary: Together, the Departments of Defense and Homeland Security and NASA invest hundreds of billions of dollars each year to develop and deliver a wide range of systems, from stealth jets to lunar rovers. Leading companies rely on certain principles to ensure product development success. But we found that these federal agencies aren't generally required to meet such principles. title: Leading Practices: Agency Acquisition Policies Could Better Implement Key Product Development Principles
